Title: Requires the city of New York to repair any sidewalk damaged by a tree under its exclusive care
Summary: Requires the city of New York to repair any sidewalk damaged by a tree under its exclusive care that is adjacent to any class one property, class two condo or coop or any house of religious worship.
LawCode: Add ยง18-105.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the city of New York to repair any sidewalk damaged by a tree under its exclusive care
